onboarding.welcomeText: We can’t wait for you to use Playback. We’ll notify you as soon as your account is verified - it usually takes less than a day.
onboarding.qrCodeText: Don’t want to wait? Ask a colleague with Playback to scan your QR code and activate your account immediately.
onboarding.qrCodeText1: Show your QR code to your colleague activate account.
onboarding.qrCodeScreenText: Ask your colleague to tap QR Code on their home screen
onboarding.verificationText: Verification successful! You can now start creating content for your patients and other providers to view, share, and replay.
onboarding.verificationTextNorthwell: Verification successful! Please log-in with your Northwell credentials to continue.
